architecture_summary: Elite Sniper V2 - Appointment booking bot with persistent session mode and DOM navigation
known_risks: Docker network isolation preventing internet connectivity
Navigation selectors may not match actual site HTML
Captcha solving reliability depends on OCR accuracy
operational_status: DEGRADED - Docker networking issue blocking connections

current_issues.description: Docker container cannot reach external internet
current_issues.workaround: Run bot outside Docker using python src/main.py

current_issues.description: DOM navigation buttons not found due to image blocking
current_issues.solution: Changed selectors from image-based to href-based
